name: Advanced Avionics
desc:
Diable Avionic designs feature custom avionics systems allowing for a much finer control of their ships. The reduction in parasite accelerations coupled with their proprietary Quantum Branch Prediction Computer allows those ships to optimize their thrust and their firing solutions the more time they spend in contact with the enemy.

Upon deployment the ships suffer a %s reduction of their weapons accuracy. But after each computation cycle of %s, the ships gain a significant boost in both weapon accuracy and engines performances. Depending on the size of the ship, %s are necessary to achieve maximum performances with %s better engine acceleration and %s better leading accuracy.

name: Resilient Frame
desc: Wanzers are exceptionally durable small crafts, with reinforced internals and tripe redundant systems. They get %s resitance to EMP, plus their weapons and engines are %s less likely to fail.
short: Gives Wanzers a %s resitance to EMP and reduce the damage taken to their weapons and engines by %s .

name: Cramped Hull
desc: This hull is abnormally small and can't accomodate any modification requiring much space such as %s, %s, or %s. Missile based weapons fire-rate reduced by %s.
short: Prevents the installation of large hullmods, reduce missiles fire-rate by %s.

name: Oversized Hull
desc: This ship is abnormally large which creates a logistical nightmare when it needs to be readied for combat. Increases CR recovery cost by %s.

name: Dampened Mount
desc: The hull's weapon emplacements are designed around extra recoil dampeners allow projectile weapons to fire at a slightly extended range of %s.

name: #Dampened Mount
desc: Extra recoil dampeners are fitted around the mounts allowing projectile weapons to fire at a slightly extended range of %s but only at %s of their maximum firerate. They also take %s more damage as a result.

name: #Dampened Mount
desc: This hullmod should no longer exist

name: Wanzer Servicing Gantry
desc:
Enlarged launch bays that ease servicing oversized space vehicles such as Wanzers. Optimized tooling and space usage allow the deck crew to manage %s for each installed Wanzer wing.

These specialized facilities do not offer any tangible benefit, nor drawback, when operating regular fighters wings.
sModDesc: Once per combat, when the fighter replacement rate reaches %s, the fighter launch bays are switched to operate from a "B-deck". Standby fighters are launched to rapidly bring wings back to full strength, and the fighter replacement rate is set to %s.

name: #Optimized Operations
desc: The crew of this ship has been trained to follow the extremely strict protocols of the Diable Avionics Corporation, leading to a somewhat more economical maintenance of %s or %s supplies per month (whichever comes first). The reduced amount of immediately available spare parts means that recovering from combat deployment takes about %s more time.
short: Reduce the monthly maintenance but also reduces the CR recovery.

name: Hyperspace Navigation Protocols
desc: The crew of this ship has been trained to spot and weather deep hyperspace storms, ships will take %s less damage from strikes.
short: Reduce the impact of hyperspace storms on the fleet.

name: Axial Rotation
desc: This structure constantly rotates around its axis.

name: Versant Frame
desc: The Versant frame offers limited customization options in the form of various firing profile for its built-in MP66-6 Harvest" guns.

name: %s: This ship is a masterfully fine-tuned machine of war that already operates with reduced margins and does not like getting tinkered with.
Therefore it is impossible to install Hull-mods that increase components stress
Fire selector: AUTOMATIC
desc:
The fire profile of the built-in Harvests guns can be changed to better suit the captain's preferences.

%s has better sustained firepower, but worse accuracy and range.

%s

name: Fire selector: BURST
desc:
The fire profile of the built-in Harvests guns can be changed to better suit the captain's preferences.

%s has better accuracy and flux efficiency, but worse sustained firepower.

%s

name: Fire selector: SEMI-AUTO
desc:
The fire profile of the built-in Harvests guns can be changed to better suit the captain's preferences.

%s has much better damage per shot and range, but worse sustained firepower and flux efficiency.

%s

name: Virtuous frame
desc:
The Virtuous frame offers extensive customization options. These non-standard equipements can alter in profound ways the flight profile of this ship.

%s: This ship is a masterfully fine-tuned machine of war that already operates with reduced margins and does not like getting tinkered with.

Therefore it is impossible to install Hull-mods that increase components stress, such as %s.

name: Broken Frame
desc: %s, this hull is broken and cannot be used in combat until it is restored.

name: Hull Config: Skirmisher
desc: This hull configuration is designed to maximize the Virtuous' ability to reach and exploit openings anywhere on the battelfield.

name: Hull Config: Brawler
desc: This hull configuration is designed to maximize the damage output of the Virtuous when engaging an enemy, or allow swift escapes from unfavorable situations.

name: Hull Config: Defender
desc: This hull configuration is designed to optimize flux use by increasing the passive defenses of the Virtuous frame, and maximize its survivability when faced with superior forces.

name: Hull Config: Recon
desc: This hull configuration is designed to improve the logistical profile of the Virtuous frame and maximize both its strategic and tactical mobility.

name: Primary Kit: Ranger
desc: This loadout is designed to take out small to medium targets extremely rapidly at short range. Secondary weapons such as missiles need to be deployed to deal with armored targets.

name: Primary Kit: Marksman
desc: This loadout is designed to support allied ships with long range high explosive precision shots. If caught in a pinch, the double-tap Kinetic shotgun sidearm should give the enemy some concerns.

name: Primary Kit: Demolition
desc: This loadout is designed to eliminate carriers and cruiser-level threats thanks to its heavy Glaux and rapid-fire High Explosive grenade launcher.

name: Primary Kit: Gunner
desc: This loadout is designed to deal with heavy defenses. The high volume kinetic minigun is ideal to saturate shields, and the modified Mostro is a proven weapon against all armor.

name: Head Weapon: Burchel
desc: This head type is equiped with a Burchel burst PD beam.

name: Head Weapon: Winee
desc: This head type is equiped with a Winee EMP emitter.

name: Head Weapon: Grave
desc: This head type is equiped with Grave light assault gun.

name: Head Weapon: Magicbox
desc: This head type is equiped with a Magicbox missile defense launcher.
